A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
A dreadful film. 

It's not about being a purist Star Wars fan from the 1970s.  This was a dreadful script\, disjointed film and it trashed the characters and foundation  of the original films.

Leia surviving in space then floating like Mary Poppins back to the ship?.  

As someone has already said "now we know why Mark Hamill hated the script so much".

 I'm taking the original 3 films and Rogue One and going home.

RIP Star Wars.
